name: Staying Dry in the Thunderstorm
description:
A cute arcade game about keeping your dog safe in a thunderstorm

This game was made in one day as an entry to the Rain Jam hosted by 08jack. It is definitely my most polished jam entry ever, and I'm super proud of how it turned out. Cramming in the difficulty options was definitely worth the effort, because it was hard to figure out whether the game was too easy or too hard.

All art and code by yours truly

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html

SFX pulled and edited from myriad youtube videos
